title: The Dreaming War
subtitle: When Fantasy Becomes Reality
description: Lead the Fae Courts as the boundaries between the mortal world and the Dreaming begin to collapse. Navigate treacherous fairy politics, wield ancient glamours, and determine whether the worlds shall merge or remain forever separate.
shortDescription: Unite the Fae Courts and decide the fate of two colliding worlds.

story.synopsis: The barrier between the Dreaming and the mortal world weakens. Queen Titania of the Summer Court and King Oberon of the Winter Court must set aside ancient rivalries to prevent catastrophe - or seize this opportunity for the Fae to rule both realms.
story.prologue: Once, the Fae walked freely between worlds, their magic shaping reality itself. But humanity's disbelief slowly banished them to the Dreaming, a realm of pure imagination. Now, after centuries of exile, the barriers crack. Dreams spill into reality. And the Fae must choose: rebuild the walls... or tear them down entirely.
story.epilogue: The boundaries have been reforged - but changed. The Dreaming and reality now exist in harmony, each strengthening the other. The Fae walk among mortals once more, not as rulers, but as guardians of wonder in a world that had forgotten how to dream.
story.setting: The Dreaming and its intersections with reality
